attributes.comment:
I oppose further burdening prospective adoptive parents with these outrageous fee
increases. These proposed fees will more than erase any tax-credit increase
touted by the IRS. I suggest that you increase all your expiration dates as most
foreign adoptions now are taking over 1.5 years to complete and these fees are
required YET AGAIN! My fingerprints have not changed from 15 months ago, why
do I need to have them taken YET AGAIN? Sorry to vent here but it is really
frustrating to go through this process and see that this increase fee proposal has
been open to comments since the first of February and just now hear of it.....I am
sure you would get a lot more comments if this increase were announced like the
recent postage stamp increase. Please do not raise these fees, they are too high
now, especially when we are paying for them twice....

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Matt M. Wagner
